product_name: Soleus Ultra Sole Digital Sports Watch - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Lightweight with large easy-to-read digits, the Ultra Sole wristwatch resists water to 100 meters and sports a 100-hour chronograph to help you track run performance and keep personal goals in reach.
short_description: Lightweight with large easy-to-read digits, the Ultra Sole wristwatch resists water to 100 meters and sports a 100-hour chronograph to help you track run performance and keep personal goals in reach.
